content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.0, 0.0)
Consists of steam engine (position (-10.0, 0.0)), boiler (position not placed due to obstruction), and offshore pump (position not specified).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Connected to steam engine at (-10.0, 0.0).

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Connected to steam engine at (-10.0, 0.0).

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (fuel: coal, status: no ingredients to smelt, position (5.0, -73.0))

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (fuel: coal, status: no ingredients to smelt, position (-18.0, -49.0))

### Pipe groups
Consists of:
- PipeGroup (position (-4.5, 21.5))
- PipeGroup (position (-4.5, 23.5))

### Electricity poles
Consists of multiple small electric poles surrounding the assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure the target location is clear of obstructions before attempting to place the boiler.

### Errors when removing obstructions
- Verify that the obstruction can be removed and is not linked to any other entity before attempting to remove it.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure that the entities you are trying to connect are within the required distance and are compatible.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to electricity
- Ensure that all machines are connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning correctly to avoid machines being without power.
